synergynet3.museum.table.mainapp.ptmViewer

Class PTMListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • multiplicity3.input.MultiTouchEventAdapter
      • synergynet3.museum.table.mainapp.ptmViewer.PTMListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMultiTouchEventListener

    public class PTMListener
extends MultiTouchEventAdapter
    The listener interface for receiving PTM events. The class that is interested in processing a PTM event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the component's addPTMListener method. When the PTM event occurs, that object's appropriate method is invoked.
    See Also:
    PTMEvent
